ValidationRule.description: Ensures that Proposal Outcome Date is populated in order to move to Contract stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'International_Projects_Unit', ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Contract'), ISBLANK(Proposal_Outcome_Date__c) )
